Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS

Title: Requires providers of voice service to implement the STIR/SHAKEN authentication framework in the internet protocol networks of voice service providers
Summary: Requires providers of voice service to implement the STIR/SHAKEN authentication framework in the internet protocol networks of voice service providers.
LawCode: Add ยง399-z-1, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring STIR/SHAKEN authentication framework
